name: Protective Order Motion
description: Templates for drafting motions for protective orders regarding deposition notices and document requests

templates.description: Analyze categories included in plaintiff's deposition notice of Person Most Knowledgeable at [client's name] to draft a motion for a protective order regarding the same.
Analyze plaintiff's lengthy request for documents included in the deposition notice for Person Most Knowledgeable at [client's name] to draft motion for a protective order regarding the same.
Analyze case and statutory law regarding protecting categories noticed by plaintiff regarding [client's name] motion for a protective order to draft motions for a protective order regarding the same.

Analyze case and statutory law regarding protecting productions requests noticed by plaintiff regarding [client's name] motion for a protective order to draft motions for a protective order regarding the same.
Draft [client's name] notice of motion for a protective order regarding deposition categories noticed by plaintiff.
Draft [client's name] motions for protective order's memorandum of points and authorities regarding legal authority for protecting deposition categories noticed by plaintiff.
Draft [client's name] motions for protective order's memorandum of points and authorities regarding legal authority for protecting production requests included in the deposition notice.
Draft [client's name] motions for protective order's memorandum of points and authorities regarding legal argument for mutually agreeable date.
Draft [client's name] motions for protective order's memorandum of points and authorities regarding legal argument regarding narrowly tailoring plaintiff deposition categories.
Further draft [client name] motion for a protective order regarding memorandum of points and authorities regarding plaintiff deposition categories for [client name] person most knowledgeable.
Further draft [client name] motion for a protective order regarding memorandum of points and authorities regarding plaintiff deposition categories for [client name] person most knowledgeable.
Further draft [client name] motion for a protective order regarding memorandum of points and authorities regarding sanctions sections.
Further draft [client name] motion for a protective order regarding memorandum of points and authorities regarding meet and confer section.
Further draft [client name] motion for a protective order regarding memorandum of points and authorities regarding attorney declaration.
Further draft [client name] motion for a protective order regarding memorandum of points and authorities regarding plaintiff deposition categories for [client name] person most knowledgeable.
Further draft [client name] motion for a protective order regarding memorandum of points and authorities regarding plaintiff deposition categories for [client name] person most knowledgeable.
